CustomField.description: The BIC (Bank Identifier Code) as stated on the payment profile.
CustomField.formula: IF ( NOT ( ISBLANK ( cpm__Custom_BIC__c ) ) , cpm__Custom_BIC__c , IF( NOT(ISBLANK(cpm__Payment_Profile__r.cpm__Clearing_Member_Id__c) ), cpm__Payment_Profile__r.cpm__Clearing_Member_Id__c, cpm__Payment_Profile__r.cpm__BIC_Code__c ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The BIC as stated on the payment profile.
CustomField.label: Account Number Additional
